General.Name: CME Group Bhd
General.Description: CME Group Berhad, an investment holding company, designs, manufactures, and sells specialized mobility vehicles, and firefighting and safety vehicles primarily in Malaysia. The company operates through Manufacturing, Trading, and Others segments. It designs, manufactures, and sells specialized mobility vehicles, fire fighting vehicles, fire engines, specialist vehicles, airport crash tenders, hazmat vehicles, aerial access ladder, cranes, fuel transfer vehicles including refuellers, riot control vehicles, fire-fighting, and rescue equipment and fixed installations. The company also services its firefighting and specialist vehicles; supplies related spare parts; sells and services firefighting gas systems and other safety related products; and develops properties. In addition, it trades and deals in various pharmaceutical, medicinal, biological, and health supplement products and related health care products. CME Group Berhad was incorporated in 1979 and is based in Subang Jaya, Malaysia.
